Test.Name: Correct response: several VEC, several profiles, profile without VEC
Correct response: one VEC, one profiles, profile with VEC
Correct response: one VEC, one profiles, profile without VEC
Correct response: one VEC, one profiles, profile without VEC, but VEC is compatible for profile
Correct response: three VEC, one profile, profile with VEC
Wrong response: item from compatible is not in total list
Wrong response: VEC from profile is not in compatible list
Wrong response: double tokens in compatible
Incorrect response: media_profile2 doesn't contain compatible conf
Test.Description: If videoEncoderConfList1 does not contain item with @token = profile1.Configurations.VideoEncoder.@token, FAIL the test and skip other steps

Test.Name: Incorrect response: 3 VEC, 1 profiles, profile with 4 compatible VEC
Incorrect response: 3 VEC, 1 profiles, profile with 4 VEC
Incorrect response: GetVideoEncoderConfigurations Response w VEC token w wrong token
Incorrect response: GetVideoEncoderConfigurations Response w VEC token empty
Incorrect response: GetVideoEncoderConfigurations Response w VEC token w several VECs
